exceptions.tactic: intros m x y j i m1 y0 y_1 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8.

original: intros m x y j i m1 y0 y_1 dx H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8. unfold m1, y0, y_1, dx. intros H9 H10 H11. replace (MF.degree_aux (L m one x y) (cA_1 m one y) (dx - (j + 1 + i))) with (MF.degree_aux m1 (cA_1 m one y) (dx - (j + 1 + i))); auto. replace (dx - (j + 1 + i)) with (S (dx - (S (j + i)))) by omega. replace (S (dx - (S (j + i)))) with (S dx - (j + 1 + i)) by omega. unfold MF.degree_aux. ring.
